entry.title: WINTER STORM WATCH , Pincher Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:35 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, 0.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Pincher Creek Airport 08:48 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
Condition: Sunny
Temperature: 0.2°C
Pressure: 100.6 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 50 %
Dewpoint: -9.1°C
Wind: WSW 55 km/h gust 68 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly cloudy. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50 increasing to 60 gusting to 80 late this morning. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Flurries at times heavy beginning near midnight. 60 percent chance of flurries near the British Columbia border this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind west 60 km/h gusting to 80 diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 then becoming south 20 late this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 19 February 2023
